item.description:
This event is open to everyone, especially for those interested in conversation and clinking glasses, while listening to live music. And, as an added incentive, there's no cover.


Here's what's happening:

"Creation Tuesdays" at the Spot Underground:
2010 & 2011 Motif Magazine Best Open Mic
Motif-Award-Winning Networking Night for Musicians, Music Lovers, & Artists of All sorts.

7:30-9:00pm: Open Mic
9:00pm-11:00pm: Featured acts
11:00pm-1:00am: Spot Collaborative Jam

Orchestrated by Artistic Director, Josh Willis
Led by jammaster Matt Martin (Psychedelic Clown Car) & Friends
FREE | 18+ | Doors @ 7:30

Hope to see you there!

http://www.thespotprovidence.com/the_spot_underground.html

As always - come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...
item.how_to_find_us: John is hosting this one! Please look at his picture!
item.name: Tuesday Night: "Creation Tuesday" at the Spot Underground!!!
